description: Unique internal identifier for the record in the FAQ table; typically used for referencing or sorting. Confirm whether it is strictly sequential and serves as the primary key with the SME.
Display sequence within its category; lower numbers likely appear first in lists. Used to order items under the same grouping; confirm behavior when duplicate values exist.
Name of the category or topic that groups related entries for navigation or filtering. Likely corresponds to a functional module or product area; confirm controlled vocabulary with the SME.
End-user facing inquiry text displayed on help pages or support portals.
Response text presented to users, providing guidance or steps that address the corresponding inquiry.
Identifier of the user or automated process that created the entry, for audit and ownership tracking.
Timestamp when the entry was created, stored in system time zone; used for audit trails and recency sorting.
Identifier of the user or process that last modified the entry; may be null if never updated.
Timestamp of the most recent modification; null when no updates have occurred since creation.
